About me

I am a second year master student in University of Alberta. Here is a detailed online CV of me.

I have done projects on machine learning related to various fields, such as recommendation system based on latent dirichlet allocation, fMRI image classification and bandit online learing. Now I am working with Prof. Greiner on applying sparse methods on patient specific survival prediction.

My previous blog will still run in future. I will probably write blogs in Chinese about my life there and in English in this new blog mainly about machine learning, stats, and other topics related to computer science.
